en.bdb: What is demanded of a disciple  ?

verse.gurmukhi: pYrI pY pw Kwku murIdY QIvxw[
verse.unicode: ਪੈਰੀ ਪੈ ਪਾ ਖਾਕੁ ਮੁਰੀਦੈ ਥੀਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: By becoming the dust of the feet the disciple is required to be near the feet of the the Guru.

transliteration.english: pairee pai paa khaak mureedhai theevanaa|
transliteration.hindi: पैरी पै पा खाकु मुरीदै थीवणा।
transliteration.en: pairee pai paa khaak mureedhai theevanaa|
transliteration.hi: पैरी पै पा खाकु मुरीदै थीवणा।
transliteration.ipa: pæri pæ pɑ kʰɑk mʊrid̪æ t̪ʰiʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: پَےریِ پَے پا کھاک مُریِدَے تھیِوݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gur mUriq musqwku mir mir jIvxw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਮੁਸਤਾਕੁ ਮਰਿ ਮਰਿ ਜੀਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: Becoming an avid suiter of the form (word) of the Guru and being dead to greed, infatuation and other relational propensities, he should remain alive in the world.

transliteration.english: gur moorat musataak mar mar jeevanaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर मूरति मुसताकु मरि मरि जीवणा।
transliteration.en: gur moorat musataak mar mar jeevanaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर मूरति मुसताकु मरि मरि जीवणा।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr murət̪ mʊsət̪ɑk mər mər d͡ʒiʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر مُورت مُستاک مر مرِ جیِوݨا۔

en.bdb: Repudiating all worldly connections he must remain dyed in the colour of the Lord.

verse.gurmukhi: hor n JKxu Jwk srix mnu sIvxw[
verse.unicode: ਹੋਰ ਨ ਝਖਣੁ ਝਾਕ ਸਰਣਿ ਮਨੁ ਸੀਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: Seeking no shelter elsewhere he should keep his mind absorbed in the shelterof God, the Guru.

transliteration.english: hor na jhakhan jhaak saran man seevanaa|
transliteration.hindi: होर न झखणु झाक सरणि मनु सीवणा।
transliteration.en: hor na jhakhan jhaak saran man seevanaa|
transliteration.hi: होर न झखणु झाक सरणि मनु सीवणा।
transliteration.ipa: hɔr nə ɖ͡ʐəkʰəɳ ɖ͡ʐɑk sərəɳ mən siʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: هور ن جھکھݨ جھاک سرݨ من سیِوݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: iprm ipAwlw pwk AimA rsu pIvxw[
verse.unicode: ਪਿਰਮ ਪਿਆਲਾ ਪਾਕ ਅਮਿਅ ਰਸੁ ਪੀਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: Sacred is the cup of the love of the beloved; he should quaff that only.

transliteration.english: piram piaalaa paak amia ras peevanaa|
transliteration.hindi: पिरम पिआला पाक अमिअ रसु पीवणा।
transliteration.en: piram piaalaa paak amia ras peevanaa|
transliteration.hi: पिरम पिआला पाक अमिअ रसु पीवणा।
transliteration.ipa: pɪrəm pɪəɑlɑ pɑk əmɪə rəs piʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: پِرم پآلا پاک اما رس پیِوݨا۔

en.bdb: Making humility his abode he should get poised in it.
Divorcing the (tastes of ) ten organs i.e.not being caught in their dragnet, he should attain equipose.

verse.gurmukhi: swvDwn gur vwk n mn BrmIvxw[
verse.unicode: ਸਾਵਧਾਨ ਗੁਰ ਵਾਕ ਨ ਮਨ ਭਰਮੀਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: He must be fully conscious about the word of Guru and should not allow the mind to be entrapped in delusions.

transliteration.english: saavadhaan gur vaak na man bharameevanaa|
transliteration.hindi: सावधान गुर वाक न मन भरमीवणा।
transliteration.en: saavadhaan gur vaak na man bharameevanaa|
transliteration.hi: सावधान गुर वाक न मन भरमीवणा।
transliteration.ipa: sɑʋət̪ɑn Gʊr ʋɑk nə mən ɓərəmiʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: ساودھان گُر واک ن من بھرمیِوݨا۔

en.bdb: Absorption of consciousness in the Word makes  him alert and this way one gets across the Word – ocean.
